text:
My inspiration for my studies isn't a person but it's actually a dream. A dream I want to pursue my whole life which is travelling. This degree will lead me to some traveller-friendly jobs, or at least I will do my best to travel thanks to my job. This is a dream I had my whole life, I want to see the world and its gift and I always saw travelling as a path to freedom and peace.
I am pretty sure that this degree will make me live rewarding experiences, because it's not only about travelling but it's also about learning new things everyday which is really important to me. I want to be aware of reality, I am definitely not willing to live in some kind of illusion and a degree like this was the best option to me because I want to learn about a new world that we all live in but don't know much about.
Plus I am really interested in communication because, in a way, it's a mixture of philosophy and economics which are two subjects that I do like. I like to think about people's behavior and interests and to connect these thoughts to their social environment.
Finally, I would say that my inspiration for my studies is knowledge.
